parameters.name: TemplateName
parameters.description: Path and name of BOM table template (see Remarks )

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X coordinate for the placement of the BOM table

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y coordinate for the placement of the BOM table

parameters.name: BomType
parameters.description: Type of BOM table as defined by swBomType_e

parameters.name: ConfigurationName
parameters.description: Name of the configuration for this BOM table (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Hidden
parameters.description: True to hide the BOM table, false to show it

title: IModelDocExtension.InsertBomTable2
signature:
BomTableAnnotation InsertBomTable2( 
   System.String
TemplateName
,
   System.Int32
X
,
   System.Int32
Y
,
   System.Int32
BomType
,
   System.String
ConfigurationName
,
   System.Boolean
Hidden
)

parameters.name: TemplateName
parameters.description: Path and name of BOM table template (see Remarks )

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X coordinate for the placement of the BOM table

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y coordinate for the placement of the BOM table

parameters.name: BomType
parameters.description: Type of BOM table as defined by swBomType_e

parameters.name: ConfigurationName
parameters.description: Name of the configuration for this BOM table (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Hidden
parameters.description: True to hide the BOM table, false to show it

remarks:
The system does not default to the Default configuration when you specify an empty string for Configuration. You must specify the configuration.
BOM table templates are in the <
SOLIDWORKS_
install_dir
>\
lang
\<
language
> folder and have a filename extension of
.sldbomtbt
. The template and table must be of the same type. For example, you could specify
C:\Program Files\SOLIDWORKS\lang\English\bom-standard.sldbomtbt
for TemplateName if you wanted to insert an English-version of the standard BOM table template.
If the BOM table is a parts-only or indented-style BOM and ConfigurationName is invalid, then the BOM is not created.
